tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_data (
  entry_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  production_date DATE,
  issue_id INT,
  department VARCHAR(100),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE QualityIssues (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_description TEXT,
    production_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RootCauses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cause_description TEXT,
    issue_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    issue_id INT,
    product_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE SQLQueries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query TEXT,
    result TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE Issue (id INT PRIMARY KEY, description TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE RootCause (id INT PRIMARY KEY, issue_id INT, analysis TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES Issue(id));
CREATE TABLE ProductionData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, issue_id INT, value FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES Issue(id));
CREATE TABLE QualityCheck (id INT PRIMARY KEY, issue_id INT, passed BOOLEAN, timestamp TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES Issue(id));
CREATE TABLE QueryAnalysis (id INT PRIMARY KEY, issue_id INT, query TEXT, result TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES Issue(id));
